artist: Artist: Peltro William Tomkins; Artist: after Samuel Medley
creditline: Gift of Brian and Julia Morrison Palmer
description: head and torso of little girl with short curly hair; body facing L; girl wears white dress with puffy sleeves; girl points up with PR hand; trees in background

title: Miss Cowley
